price: Ìyẹn nítorí pé ẹ̀ ń yọ lórí ilẹ̀ ní ọ̀nà àìtọ́ àti nítorí pé, ẹ̀ ń ṣe fáàrí (lórí àìgbàgbọ́).
arabic: ذَٰلِكُم بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَفۡرَحُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ بِغَيۡرِ ٱلۡحَقِّ وَبِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَمۡرَحُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
